alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; San Juan County; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 24 at 3:05PM PST until December 25 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...San Juan County, Western Whatcom County, Western Skagit County and Admiralty Inlet Area zones. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...King tides Sunday will result in unusually high water levels at high tide. Minor tidal overflow and coastal erosion is possible.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; San Juan County; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County
